DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - Medium Filbert
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Medium Filbert Face Painting Brush #BRUFILM is 0.35 inches wide and serves to add special designs. Snazaroo Brushes have nickel plated ferrules, a 7 5/8 in yellow handle, and high-quality nylon synthetic bristles. Snazaroo synthetic brushes offer value, durability, and are easy to clean. The Snazaroo Medium Filbert Brush works well for creating small butterfly wings.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red medium filbert face painting brush
Features high-quality synthetic bristles, nickel plated ferrules with a 7 5/8" yellow handle
